message: Week9.json ALREADY COMPLETE with high-quality explanations. All 15 questions across 2 topics (Intelligence Theories, Intelligence Testing) have proper "explanation" objects with "correct" (30-60 words, cite researchers/theories) and "incorrect" fields (20-40 words, specific to each wrong option). Quality verification passed against 5-Second Rule: explanations explain WHY, cite Spearman/Cattell/Sternberg/Gardner, address specific misconceptions, and meet word count targets. No modifications needed.
